books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Graeme Simsion
books.description: A man with Asperger's syndrome becomes involved with an unconventional woman.
books.name: THE ROSIE PROJECT

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by James Patterson and Emily Raymond
books.description: Sixteen-year-old Axi Moore invites her best friend, whom she secretly loves, on a cross-country road trip.
books.name: FIRST LOVE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Kathleen Brooks
books.description: The romance between the bodyguard Ahmed and Bridget Springer, his co-worker, heats up in the sixth book of the Bluegrass Brothers series.
books.name: FINAL VOW

books.author: by Joyce Maynard
books.description: One holiday weekend in New Hampshire, the lives of a single mother and her son are irrevocably changed when they show kindness to a stranger with a terrible secret. Originally published in 2009; now a movie.
books.name: LABOR DAY

books.author: by Kresley Cole
books.description: In the third installment of Game Maker, an erotica series, a Russian Mafia enforcer, Aleksandr Sevastyan, ordered to protect his boss's daughter, spirits her from Russia to the decadent playgrounds of the super-wealthy in Paris.
books.name: THE PROFESSIONAL, PART 3

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: The Boston detective D. D. Warren, seriously injured at a crime scene, is treated by a pain therapist whose father was a serial killer.
books.name: FEAR NOTHING

books.author: by Tom Clancy with Mark Greaney
books.description: President Jack Ryan and his son, a covert intelligence expert, try to counter a Russian threat in Clancy’s last novel before his death.
books.name: COMMAND AUTHORITY

books.author: by V.C. Andrews
books.description: Four innocent children are locked away from the world by their selfish mother. Originally published in 1979; now a Lifetime movie.
books.name: FLOWERS IN THE ATTIC

books.author: by J. S. Cooper and Helen Cooper
books.description: Katie Raymond learns that the handsome and sexually compelling billionaire Brandon Hastings, her first love seven years ago, has bought the corporation she works for. The first of three erotic novellas.
books.name: THE EX GAMES

books.author: by Helene Wecker
books.description: A chance meeting between mythical beings leads to a journey through cultures in New York at the turn of the 20th century.
books.name: THE GOLEM AND THE JINNI
